about_the_game:
What if you are someone who has to look at problems differently from everyone else and the only option left to be able to dominate all the details is surpassing yourself .
You are an experienced detective and the last event you have faced with , requires analysis of a lot of scientific data, so what should you do? Now, you will push the limits of your mind, every step will take you and your story to another dimension, like a journey to discover the "other you" in every knot. Mute the pains of the past and gripes of existence, as you will not have time to listen to yourself.



Forfeit is inspired by real events that are tried to be hidden; It is a game with thrill, adventure and mystery. As Detective Donald, chase the unknown, meddle with the mystery, equate and push the limits. Think calmly, patiently and practically. There is a multi-piece puzzle story whose every piece is another story and it is waiting for you.
In this story, as you go out of the darkness of a misty night, you may be left with dozens of questions in your mind. You may involuntarily find yourself in Nevada's mysterious Area 51, and jump from there to another dimension. Come on,start the game, the story is yours.






  • The game is based on puzzles which contain missions ranging from simple to complex ones. By moving left and right and fulfilling the given tasks, the detective tracks down in various atmospheres adorned with dizzying graphics.

  • Realistic 3D scenes that make you feel like you are in a movie scene,

  • Atmospheric sound and music design,

  • Plain interface, so you are not distracted, you focus on the game

  • Experience the story based on true events that have remained hidden until now



LOSSDEAD GAME STUDIO is an indie (independent developer) game company. Our goal is to provide you, our valuable gamers, the best gaming experience. If you want to motivate and contribute to us, you can add us to your wish list and follow.

name: FORFEIT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, Radeon R9-270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
